level.text: In order for covered entities to meet their obligations under the Act and to provide enforcement thereof, the Office of Human Rights (“OHR”) adopts this chapter:
To define the roles and responsibilities of parties assigned to oversee and implement the Language Access Act (“the Act”);
To provide assistance with data collection on the languages spoken by a limited or non-English proficient (“LEP/NEP”) population as required under the Act;
To provide assistance and guidance to covered entities with major public contact in implementing a biennial language access plan (“BLAP”) and on reporting requirements for all covered entities; and
To set forth guidelines for the investigation of complaints filed under the Act and its enforcement.
